name: Ginger Strawberry Wine Punch
description: Ginger adds a little kick to this!
directions: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Whiz ginger, ginger syrup, strawberries lime juice in a blender for at least 30 seconds or until smooth.
Add the wine and bourbon to the blender and mix for about fifteen seconds.
This recipe was adapted from this delightful version here:  https://fromthelarder.co.uk/strawberry-stem-ginger-sangria/#recipe
